thought.text: There are conflicts with the system urllib3. Let me try a different approach and run the test directly:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpa_yjin4u/requests && PYTHONPATH=/tmp/tmpa_yjin4u/requests python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import requests; print('Requests version:', requests.__version__)"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmpa_yjin4u/requests && PYTHONPATH=/tmp/tmpa_yjin4u/requests python -c \"import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import requests; print('Requests version:', requests.__version__)\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
